name: Fighter
description: Fighters are a skilled generalist warriors. Fighters can wear any armor and wield any weapon, and make effective front line combatants. They have no access to magic spells at any level.

name: Cleric
description: Clerics are capable combatants and also wield divine magic. They can wear any armor, but are limited to blunt weapons such as maces, hammers, clubs and slings.

name: Ranger
description: Rangers have advanced survival skills and can be deadly with a bow. They learn a few spells at later levels. They may use any weapon, but are restricted to light or medium armors.

name: Wizard
description: Wizards are capable of casting powerful arcane spells but do not last long in melee combat. They may not wear any armor, and may only wield a staff, a dagger, a sling, or darts in combat.

name: Thief
description: Thieves are not strong melee combatants but benefit from stealth and agility. They may develop skills in picking locks and disarming traps. They may use any weapon but are limited to light armor.

name: Paladin
description: Paladins are godly knights sworn to uphold the law. They are strong frontline fighters with some healing skills and access to a limited range of cleric spells at higher levels. They may use any weapon or armor.
